feature.label: erlide SDK
feature.description: This feature provides Erlang IDE support for Eclipse, including unit and functional testing. For bug reports and feature requests, please use the SouceForge trackers at http://sourceforge.net/projects/erlide/. Mailing to erlide-devel@sf.net would be the second option.
